hero.subtitle: M&A advisory for SMEs and mid-caps. Valuation €5M-€50M. Sell-side, buy-side, fundraising.
hero.ctaSeller: I want to sell my business
hero.ctaBuyer: I want to acquire a business

provider.paragraph1: Your strategic decisions require more than simple support. At alecia, we stand by your side at every stage, with the same determination as an entrepreneur invested in their own success.
provider.paragraph2: Your transactions are handled with care by dedicated partners who orchestrate the construction of key information, identify buyers, investors or lenders, and coordinate all advisors involved.

expertises.title: Our expertise
expertises.subtitle: Your projects deserve more than standard advice. With deep experience in financial transactions and operations.

cession.title: Divestiture & Succession
cession.description: Selling your business is a decisive moment that requires flawless preparation and execution.
cession.longDescription: Selling your business is a decisive moment that requires flawless preparation and execution. alecia helps you secure the transaction, defend your interests and maximize the value of your company, while respecting your history and employees.
cession.step1Desc: Realistic and transparent valuation of your business, implementation of a sales strategy.
cession.step2Desc: Targeting and discreet approach of potential buyers through our extensive network.
cession.step3Desc: Assistance in all phases of negotiation through to completion of the sale.
cession.challenge2: Preparing documentation tailored to buyer expectations
cession.challenge3: Optimizing valuation, negotiating and making your terms heard

fundraising.title: Fundraising & Financing
fundraising.description: Whether to finance your growth or restructure your capital, we support you.
fundraising.longDescription: Whether to finance your growth, invest in new projects, restructure your capital or realize your wealth, alecia offers expert fundraising advice tailored to your specific needs.
fundraising.step1Desc: Developing innovative strategies using dilutive or non-dilutive instruments.
fundraising.step2Desc: We cultivate a vast network of investors and financial institutions.
fundraising.step3Desc: Assistance in structuring deals and negotiating the best terms.
fundraising.challenge1: Identifying the best combination of funding sources
fundraising.challenge3: Negotiating favorable terms aligned with your strategy

acquisition.title: Acquisition
acquisition.description: Acquiring a company is a major strategic lever to accelerate growth.
acquisition.longDescription: Acquiring a company is a major strategic lever to accelerate your company's growth. We guide you through this complex process with proven expertise and methodology.
acquisition.step1Desc: Precise identification of targets, evaluation of their value and strategic fit.
acquisition.step2Desc: Support in negotiations to optimize financial terms.
acquisition.step3Desc: Strategic advice for smooth and effective integration.
acquisition.challenge1: Identifying the ideal target for your growth project
acquisition.challenge3: Structuring a secure and balanced acquisition

regional.subtitle: Our multi-regional presence and entrepreneurial backgrounds enable us to understand the challenges and daily reality of business leaders.

valuation.description: Get a free initial estimate based on your sector multiples. Our tool uses comparable transaction data to give you an order of magnitude.

cta.subtitle: Contact one of our partners for an initial confidential discussion.

operations.title: Transactions

team.title: Our team
team.subtitle: The variety of our backgrounds and expertise is alecia's strength
team.hiringSubtitle: Join a dynamic team and participate in exciting transactions.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle: Are you a business owner, shareholder, or investor? Contact us for more information.

careers.title: Join the alecia adventure
careers.subtitle: We are looking for talented individuals passionate about corporate finance and entrepreneurship advisory.

values.teamworkDesc: Close collaboration between partners and analysts on every project.
values.balanceDesc: A healthy work-life balance and modern offices.

spontaneous.title: Spontaneous application
spontaneous.subtitle: No opening matches your profile? Send us your spontaneous application, we are always looking for new talent.
